data_1.title: Domain Names
data_1.content: Management of the DNS Root Zone (assignments of ccTLDs and gTLDs) along with other functions such as the .int and .arpa zones.

data_2.title: Number Resources
data_2.content: Coordination of the global IP and AS number spaces, such as allocations made to Regional Internet Registries.

data_3.title: Protocol Assignments
data_3.content: The central repository for protocol name and number registries used in many Internet protocols.
